OnKeyDown() OnKeyDownLuthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.TreeViewKeyboardEventHandler Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.TreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerOnKeyDown
virtual void Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.TreeViewKeyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDown (TreeViewCommandArgs commandArgs)[protected], [virtual]
Invoked, and awaited, as part of the synchronous UI event handler for 'onkeydownwithpreventscroll' events..
This method is invoked by the async version: 'OnKeyDownAsync(TreeViewCommandArgs)'.
Any overrides of this method are intended to have 'base.MethodBeingOverridden()' prior to their code.
Reimplemented in Luthetus.Extensions.Git.Models.GitTreeViewKeyboardEventHandler.

OnKeyDownAsync() OnKeyDownAsyncLuthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.TreeViewKeyboardEventHandler Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.TreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerOnKeyDownAsync
virtual Task Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.TreeViewKeyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync (TreeViewCommandArgs commandArgs)[virtual]
Invoked, and awaited, as part of the async UI event handler for 'onkeydownwithpreventscroll' events..
The synchronous version: 'OnKeyDown(TreeViewCommandArgs)' will be invoked immediately from within this method, to allow the synchronous code to block the UI purposefully.
Any overrides of this method are intended to have 'base.MethodBeingOverridden()' prior to their code.
